headline: 2 Top Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Berkshire Hathaway remains an attractive investment despite its upcoming leadership change.  Vertex Pharmaceuticals has room to grow in its core market and continues to innovate in new areas.  Two great examples are Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B) and Vertex Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ: VRTX).
